review: I love it, way better than roku. Will be replacing my last roku box with another one of these.
author: FantasyLand

review: "Was wolzt du?"  I want you to speak English. It was okay, lots to buy.  I still haven't seen any movies worth 14.99, since I can take in a whole Myrtle Beach amusement park with free kraut dogs for that.  Yawl have at it.
author: spritzqueen17

review: This is my favorite device in my entertainment center!
author: Lincoln Tan

review: This is without question a must get. No more using laptop very easy to setup and start watching your favorite shows !!
author: James Cunningham

review: The best investment for entertainment I have ever made. Say goodbye to outrageous television companies that promise you $35.00 a month but if you want any channels worth watching its more like $220.00 plus a month and a bunch of channels not worth watching unless you like to watch paint dry, or grass grow.
author: Apache Crying Bear

review: I love it, although I am away from home to often to use it.... But when I use it, it's great not to be disturbed by commercials!!!!!!! Love it!
author: A. W. F. Pera "Alexander"

review: We absolutely love it! Excellent purchase for Prime users.
